description: Change of use of first floor into residential (Class C3), provision of basement accommodation, a two storey front ground and first floor extension and two additional floors at fourth and fifth floor levels all to provide an additional 65 self contained flats (two studio, nine 1 - bedroomed, thirty seven 2 - bed roomed and seventeen 3- bedroomed) together with car parking within a 3 - level stacking system, cycle provision at basement level, refuse store and associated hard and soft landscaping.
